users.description: Every 10 seconds someone has a potentially life-threatening #asthma attack. Our aim is to stop asthma attacks and cure asthma. Monitored Mon-Fri, 9am-5pm

tweets.text: Wildlife crime in action @EnvAgency this is the nesting season you have forced sand martins and kingfisher out of the heir burrows. Last week the birds were in, now gone @Cumbriapolice https://t.co/tsE1ODCzoS
@MissyDoom @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @bbchealth Totally agree, stench during the day, gassing in our beds overnight...

@MissyDoom @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk @bbchealth Just feels like they are finding any way they can to minimise it and make us feel like we are raging on about nothing. That letter was frankly an insult. Visiting during the day because they can‚Äôt be arsed to come and find out the real truths of this situation. Useless

Mr Speaker, We love our kids to get fresh air and play in the park, don‚Äôt we????

Maybe not 

#stopthestink

#WalleysQuarry #mullaghglass #biffawestmill https://t.co/mTmqU7JjOH

We‚Äôre setting the most ambitious target to cut emissions in the world.

Pete Lloyd now speaking. He agrees that the talent to understand and interpret data is lacking in the E.A. He also doubts that there's enough experience in staff at the E.A. to be effective in asking the right questions of sewage treatment works

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.

tweets.text: @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @PHE_uk Effects might be short term for one off exposure but when the toxic gases are inside our homes 20/24 hours effects are definitely long term, these people are thick, no other words for them.

@WindrushWasp @emma_wiik I think you're being overly pessimistic tbh. The problem in relation to watercourse pollution is the unbridled power of the WaterCos due to the ineffectual checks on them by the @EnvAgency and @Ofwat @OfwatChair ; the legislation and powers are there..

Storm outfalls are a key source of pollution in the aquatic environment. With a new understanding of the number of discharge events taking place, the UK will legislate for improvements. Featuring @EnvAgency @WaterUK @sascampaigns https://t.co/dBtjk8Zjd9

This is a disgrace. @sascampaigns were talking sewage, endocrine disruptors and reed beds in THE 90s! THE 90'S!
Get a grip @Ofwat @WaterUK @EnvAgency ! https://t.co/nC8ULSyHQI

tweets.text: @GreenAllianceUK @GreenAllianceUK We've a critical emergency in Newcastle under Lyme due to being engulfed in toxic H2S gases from @WalleysL landfill. It is causing widespread health issues & is infiltrating homes day & night. We really need help as @EnvAgency & @PHE_uk are useless @StinkStopthe

@OSBrecks @FreckenhamVH @SuffolkPolice @CambsCops @FascinatingFens @EnvAgencyAnglia @AngliaEnforceEA THANKS @OSBrecks for organising clear up of swag we removed from Lee Brook after discovering it while snorkelling. Thanks too @lesleydolphin for interviewing me re find (4.30 yesterday) https://t.co/I5fr3BUOo1 & glutton for punishment - inviting me back as sofa guest on 30 April! https://t.co/v1U2HbXV8m

@EnvAgency visiting #WalleysQuarry during the day is a start but the daytime odour is only the tip of the stinky iceberg. It's exponentially worse at night and I've come to dread sunset as that's when the landfill gas fills the house @PHE_uk #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @bbchealth
@numenini @FreckenhamVH @SuffolkPolice @CambsCops @FascinatingFens @EnvAgencyAnglia @AngliaEnforceEA Local swimmers have volunteered to clean it all up
